# Bladeweave (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Pattern Spells|pattern]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** See text

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 31

*With a shout you unleash the power of the spell, causing every movement you make with your weapon to seem beautiful and full of flourish.*

Once per round, choose one target that you successfully attacked with a melee weapon. That creature must succeed on a Will save or be [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round. Spell resistance applies to this effect.
